start_main_title: Provide identity verification details for a PSC or relevant legal entity
start_service_description: Use this service to provide verification details for a company's person with significant control (PSC), or a relevant legal entity's (RLE) relevant officer.
start_service_user_list_item1: new PSCs of a new or existing company
start_service_user_list_item2: current PSCs that are already on the Companies House register
start_service_user_list_item3: people providing verification details on behalf of a PSC
start_service_user_list_item4: RLEs providing information about a relevant officer for the first time
start_service_user_list_item5: RLEs telling us about a new relevant officer
start_service_restriction_description: You cannot use this service if the PSC has their personal information protected at Companies House (or are waiting for the results of an application)
start_learn_details_main_link: Learn more about PSCs, RLEs and relevant officers
start_learn_details_psc_description: A PSC owns or controls a company. They’re sometimes called ‘beneficial owners’. A PSC has at least one of the following:
start_learn_details_psc_list_item1: more than 25% of shares in the company
start_learn_details_psc_list_item2: more than 25% of voting rights in the company
start_learn_details_psc_list_item3: the right to appoint or remove the majority of the board of directors
start_learn_details_rle_description: A corporate body or firm that owns or controls a company can also be a ‘person with significant control’ (PSC) known as a relevant legal entity (RLE).
start_learn_details_rle_list: RLE status is determined by a number of different criteria including:
start_learn_details_rle_list_item2: rights to share in surplus assets
start_learn_details_rle_list_item3: the right to appoint or remove the members of the company
start_learn_details_ro_description: Relevant legal entities (RLEs) are now required to provide information about a relevant officer. A relevant officer needs to be:
start_learn_details_ro_list_item1: a director of the entity, or someone whose roles and responsibilities correspond to that of a company director
start_learn_details_ro_list_item3: have a personal code from verifying
start_learn_when_to_verify_description: This depends on when you became a PSC or relevant officer. Find out more about
start_learn_when_to_verify_link: when you need to verify your identity.
start_before_verify_description: The PSC or relevant officer must
start_before_list: For this service, you'll need the:
start_before_list_item1: Companies House personal code for the PSC or relevant officer
start_before_required_description: If you're providing verification details for a relevant officer, you'll need their full name and date of birth.
start_personal_code_details_main_link: What is a Companies House personal code?
start_personal_code_details_description: This is an 11 character code that is given to a person after they have verified their identity with Companies House.
